articles.title: Those Who Hurt Dignity of DPRK's Supreme Leadership Are Bound to Meet Stern Punishment: CPRK Spokesman
articles.content:
Those Who Hurt Dignity of DPRK's Supreme Leadership Are Bound to Meet Stern Punishment: CPRK Spokesman
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) made public a statement Sunday as regards the fact that only the south Korean puppet forces are making malignant and ill-boding remarks when all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas and the world progressives are significantly celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The puppet forces let reptile media slander the north, saying it fans up festive mood to celebrate the Day of the Sun while creating an extreme wartime atmosphere. They are letting loose vituperations terming the celebrations a "demonstration of the justice of its system" and "intention to rally the ranks".
					
					They even spoke ill of the true picture of the single-minded unity between the leader and people with such invectives of "shoring up of loyalty" and "consolidating system", blaring the supreme headquarters in the north is now "in trouble before the south side's proposal for dialogue."
					
					The statement said that it is another unpardonable hideous provocation that the puppet forces insult the celebrations of the Day of the Sun and hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in the wake of responding to the just and toughest steps taken by the DPRK's army and people to protect the country's sovereignty and dignity with a nuclear war racket with their American master.
					
					They should not lose discretion even though they are mad on confrontation with fellow countrymen and there should be a limit to revelation of their ignorance, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					The ever-escalating heinous provocation of the puppet group is the last-ditch efforts of those being taken aback by the spirit of the army and people of the DPRK determined to resolutely shatter the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and hostile forces, rallied close around the great leader. It is also desperate efforts to undermine the invincible might of Songun Korea ushering in a new era of the great succession and arrest its dynamic advance.
					
					It is only the south Korean puppet forces who let loose invectives against the holiday of fellow countrymen.
					
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak was labeled as the first target of the DPRK's strike because he dared slander and insult the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system.
					
					The reality clearly proves that the present conservative group of south Korea is the hordes of traitors indifferent from the Lee group.
					
					The extreme phase of confrontation has been created on the Korean Peninsula. This is a product of the inveterate hostility of the south Korean puppets toward the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and their deep-rooted nature of confrontation against its social system.
					
					The puppet group has no future as it is hostile toward fellow countrymen and resorts to confrontation policy.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are greatly enraged at the group's act of slandering the Day of the Sun, the greatest holiday of the nation, and hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					The more desperately the enemies make vituperation, the stronger the DPRK's will for retaliation will become, and the moment when it is given full play, the group of traitors will be wiped out to the last man from this land.
					
					As one can not get the sun eclipsed by palms, no one on earth can arrest the DPRK from triumphantly advancing backed by the tremendous military muscle under the rays of the sun of Juche.
					
					Those hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK will face a stern punishment.

articles.title: CPRK Urges S. Korea to Drop Confrontation Stance
articles.content:
CPRK Urges S. Korea to Drop Confrontation Stance
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Sunday gave an answer to a question put by the KCNA as regards the recent proposal of dialogue made by the incumbent chief executive and the puppet minister of Unification of south Korea.
					The chief executive at a dinner with parliamentary members from the "Saenuri Party" at Chongwadae on Thursday clarified her stand to resume dialogue with the north.
					
					Minister of Unification Ryu Kil Jae said on the same day in an exceptional "statement to the north" that he "hoped the north's authorities will show up at a conference room for dialogue especially for the discussion of issues of the north side's own concern", calling for settling the issue of normalizing the Kaesong Industrial Zone through dialogue.
					
					As regards this, the core member concerned of Chongwadae said Ryu's statement was an official proposal of dialogue that reflected the will of the chief executive.
					
					But to us, it is nothing but a crafty trick to cover up their crimes of driving the Kaesong Industrial Zone into a crisis and their nature of confrontation by misleading the public opinion, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					Those, keen on "sanctions" and "pressure", nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRPK and moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces, talked about dialogue, not uttering a word of apologizing or claiming responsibility in disregard of their crimes. This shameless act is an insult to and a mockery of the DPRK.
					
					The Foal Eagle war maneuvers are now being staged in south Korea and the U.S. and the puppet warmongers are deeply engaged in the moves for igniting a war against the DPRK under the pretext of its military countermeasures.
					
					As for the proposal for dialogue, it is an empty word without any content.
					
					Those, who fostered the present grave situation, showed no candid and sincere attitude toward the dialogue with the north but took the stand of listening to what the north thinks and wants. This is the height of arrogance.
					
					Worse still, the chief executive and the minister of Unification of south Korea let loose a spate of venomous outcries for "provocation", "dismantlement of nukes", "change" and "repetition of vicious cycle" toward the north to whom it proposed dialogue. This goes to fully prove that they still harbor hostility and intention for confrontation.
					
					Do they think is it possible to have dialogue under such situation and have they ever thought of what results will such dialogue produce.
					
					The present chief executive of south Korea appears to follow the policy of transferring to the "confrontation with dialogue" from "confrontation without dialogue" touted by the "yusin regime" early in the 1970s. If she really hopes it, she had better stop the farce of dialogue.
					
					The north-south dialogue is neither a game nor verbal spar. Such dialogue will be meaningless and useless.
					
					The south Korean authorities can never evade the blame for the present acute situation though they are resorting to crafty moves, misleading public opinion.
					
					Confrontation is incompatible with dialogue.
					
					If they have true intent for dialogue, they should drop the attitude of confrontation, to begin with, not getting inveigled in wordplay.
					
					The possibility of dialogue entirely depends on their attitude.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans who are taking part in the 15th Kimilsungia festival visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					The visitors made a bow to the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					They entered the halls of immortality where the Generalissimos lie in state and made bows to them.
					
					They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.
					
					They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Held
articles.content:
IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Held
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon was held on Sunday here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					An opening ceremony was held at Kim Il Sung Stadium.
					
					Present there were Kwak Pom Gi, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, sports persons and Pyongyangites.
					
					Taking part in it were players from more than 10 countries and regions including Ukraine, Italy, South Africa, Zimbabwe, Kenya and Namibia.
					
					Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, expressed belief that the Mangyongdae Prize Marathon, a traditional event marking the Day of the Sun, will contribute to bolstering sports exchange among countries and jointly developing the technique of marathon.
					
					The ceremony was followed by marathon event. 
					
					More than 600 players took part in it.
					
					Taking the top were Ethiopian male player Negassa Ketema Bekele, DPRK female player Kim Mi Kyong, second were Ukrainian male player Matviichuk Oleksandr and DPRK female player Kim Hye Kyong and third were Rwandan male player Mvuyekure Jean Pierre and Ethiopian female player Biru Meseret Mengistu.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Represents Reverence for Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Represents Reverence for Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon took place here Sunday.
					In this regard, Ryu Ok Hyon, deputy secretary of the DPRK Marathon Association, told KCNA: 
					
					The marathon event, held to mark President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (April 15), was a significant one full of reverence for him of the Korean people and other progressive people across the world.
					
					The annual event has ever grown in scale.
					
					The current event was attended by more than 600 men and women from 10 counties and regions, including the DPRK, Ukraine, Italy, South Africa, Zimbabwe and Ethiopia.
					
					It served as a good occasion in promoting friendship and solidarity among sportspersons of various countries and exchanging experiences with each other.
					
					Some of the participants made a good job in the race and DPRK girls renewed their records.
					
					Ethiopia and the DPRK came first in men's and women's events respectively.

articles.title: DPRK Team Beats Its Japanese Rival 3:1
articles.content:
DPRK Team Beats Its Japanese Rival 3:1
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK football team on April 13 scored three goals against its Japanese rival in preliminary match of Group H for the 2014 U-14 AFC Soccer Championship in Hong Kong, China.
					The DPRK will play its third match with the Mongolian team on April 16.

articles.title: 14th Meeting of Executive Committee of IIJI Board of Directors Held
articles.content:
14th Meeting of Executive Committee of IIJI Board of Directors Held
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The 14th Meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of Juche Idea was held here on Sunday.
					Present there were members of the Executive Committee -- Director-General of the IIJI Vishwanath who is also secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, Eleazar Rubio Aldaran, secretary general of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, and Ri Kil Song, vice-chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea.
					
					Some directors were present there as observers.
					
					Successes made by the organizations for the study of the Juche idea after the 13th Meeting of the Executive Committee of the IIJI were reviewed and the working plan for 2013 of the institute was laid out.
					
					Some members of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors were elected to fill vacancies.
					
					An appeal to the followers of the Juche idea of different countries and regions was adopted at the meeting.
					
					The appeal said that the DPRK's development and test of the nuclear weapons were the just right to defend the socialist system and the lives and properties of the people, denouncing the U.S. and its followers for their moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					It fully supported, reflecting unanimous mind of the followers of the Juche idea in the world, the strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force, a unique guarantee for the victory of the cause of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					It strongly called upon the followers of the Juche idea over the world to fully support the Korean people in their just struggle to frustrate the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK, reunify the country independently and build a thriving nation, rallied closer around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					The appeal said that the imperialists' moves will be shattered before long and the just struggle of the Korean people vigorously advancing along the road of independence and socialism will surely win a victory.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI Secretary General
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI Secretary General
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift presented by Kenichi Ogami, secretary General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by the secretary general on Saturday.
					
					Earlier, gifts presented to Kim Jong Un by the delegations of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea and the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works were conveyed to officials concerned respectively.
					
					The Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche also presented a gift to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					He was presented with a gift by the general director of the Shenyang Korean Trade and Investment Consultation Co. Ltd., China and his party taking part in the 15th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on March 22.
					Alberto Anaya Gutierrez in his message extended, on behalf of all party members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on his own behalf, highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his 101st birth anniversary.
					
					Kim Il Sung was the eternal President of the DPRK who founded the WPK and the DPRK and led them to victory, and the great leader and the benevolent father of the Korean people, the message said.
					
					He was also an outstanding international elder statesman who made extinguished contributions to defending the cause of global independence and the world socialist cause, it noted.
					
					The message expressed belief that the WPK and the Korean people would shatter all moves against the DPRK and win the final victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					It most wholeheartedly wished Kim Jong Un steady great achievements in his noble work to lead the WPK and the DPRK to victory.
					
					It sent highest regards to him.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Japanese
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Japanese
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill by Tsudomu Yamamoto, representative of the Japan-Korea Friendship Shigoku Liaison Council, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The floral basket was laid before the statues on Sunday.

articles.title: Reception Given by DPRK Government
articles.content:
Reception Given by DPRK Government
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government hosted a reception for the delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche Idea at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Sunday, a day before the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present there on invitation were visiting Director-General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea Vishwanath who is also secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations from different countries and regions.
					
					Present there were officials concerned including Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Ki Nam who is also chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea.
					
					Kim Ki Nam in his speech said that the Juche idea, Songun idea, founded and developed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is shedding its rays as a great guiding idea in the era of independence thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					He expressed belief that the followers of the Juche idea would extend support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people in the future, too, adding that he is pleased to hear the news that they are achieving many successes in the work of studying and disseminating the Juche idea.
					
					Vishwanath in his speech said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who devoted everything to the struggle for carrying out the human cause of independence will always be with the followers of the Juche idea.
					
					He praised Kim Jong Un as an outstanding statesman and world leader, saying that he is leading the Korean people and the followers of the Juche idea to victory and glory, true to the last instructions of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Participants in People's Festival Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participants in People's Festival Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Third April Spring People's Festival visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday to pay respect to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					They entered the hall where the statues of the Generalissimos are standing.
					
					They paid respect to the Generalissimos, recollecting the exploits they performed by advancing the Juche-based idea and line of literature and art and making the Korean people create and enjoy genuine art through energetic guidance.
					
					At the halls of immortality where the Generalissimos lie in state the participants made a bow to them.
					
					They went round with keen interest the halls where the orders the Generalissimos received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Ministry of People's Security
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Ministry of People's Security
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected at the Ministry of People's Security.
					An unveiling ceremony took place on Sunday.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Won Hong and others, officials of party and armed forces organs, officials of the ministry and security workers, service personnel of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), officials and employees of units which rendered devoted services for the building of the statues, helpers and Pyongyangites.
					
					Senior party and state officials unveiled the statues.
					
					A floral basket sent by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					Also laid before them were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet and a floral basket in the joint name of the Ministry of People's Security and the Political Bureau of the KPISF.
					
					All the participants made a bow to the statues.
					
					Minister of People's Security Choe Pu Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, in an address said that it is the ardent desire of political defenders of the party to praise the personalities of the peerlessly great men and glorify them for all ages by building their statues.
					
					All the security workers and service personnel of the KPISF built the statues on the highest level with immense loyalty, he noted.
					
					He called on them to hold the Generalissimos in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche with noble revolutionary conscience and sense of moral obligation and defend and glorify their undying revolutionary feats.
					
					There took place a ceremony of the female brass band and military band of the KPISF to be followed by march-pasts of the guards of honor of the three services of the Korean People's Army, air and anti-air forces and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards.
					
					The participants looked round the statues, being briefed on them.

articles.title: Mosaics Portraying Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Different Units of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mosaics Portraying Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Different Units of Pyongyang
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Mosaics portraying President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected in different units of Pyongyang on the occasion of the April holidays.
					Mosaic "The Great Country" was built in the seat of Ryokpho District.
					
					Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il visited the district many times, indicating the orientation and ways of bringing about a turn in agricultural production and ensuring the regular supply of vegetables and fruits to citizens.
					
					Mosaics "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Will Always Be with Us" were erected in Samsok District and Kangnam County.
					
					Reflected in the mosaics are boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who indicated the methods of farming while walking field path despite bad weather and opened the way of socialist rural construction.
					
					Mosaics were also erected in the seat of Kangdong County, Kim Po Hyon University, the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection. 
					
					Unveiling ceremonies took place at relevant units.

articles.title: Third-Day Performance of People's Art Festival Held
articles.content:
Third-Day Performance of People's Art Festival Held
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Third April Spring People's Art Festival is going on before full houses every day.
					The festive mood has gained momentum on Sunday.
					
					People from all walks of life marking the Day of the Sun packed ten odd places in Pyongyang including theatres and music halls.
					
					Enjoying performances were officials, working people and youth and students, overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					Central and local art troupes' artistes and members of itinerant art squads and art groups of working people and overseas Korean artistes put on the stage colorful numbers including songs, instrumental music, dance and magic pieces.
					
					With a great joy of grandly celebrating the April holiday as an all-people art festival, the performers presented choruses "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" and "People Sing of April Holiday."
					
					Chorus and dance "Our Leader" and story telling and chorus "We Always Remember All Sorts of Hardships Undergone by the Leader" deeply moved the audience by making them recollect the revolutionary life of the peerlessly great man shining with outstanding idea and theory, gigantic revolutionary practice and noble traits.
					
					Watching female trio "The Glow over Kangson" and chorus "When Taking Field Road" the audience looked back on how Kim Il Sung led the workers to perform miracles and feats, always finding himself among them, and covered bad farm roads, saying that agriculture is the great foundation of the country.
					
					In numbers like orchestra "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" the performers sang high praises of the army-building feats Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, performed by achieving the historic victories in the fierce anti-Japanese war and the Fatherland Liberation War, training the matchless army and providing the eternal treasured sword for defending the country, revolution and socialism.
					
					They vividly represented the eye-opening change of the country dynamically advancing along the road of prosperity under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					The fourth movement "We Pledge" from symphony "The Leader Will Always Be with Us" represented the steadfast will of the Korean people to uphold Kim Il Sung as the sun of Juche for all ages.
					
					Functional magic "Trick by Playing Cards", illusionary jugglery "Work of Juggler" and other magic pieces added to optimism and joy of the people greeting the Day of the Sun as a great jubilee of the nation.
					
					The performances continue.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture Sunday to celebrate the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senor party, state and army officials, the chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, merited persons, Pyongyangites, delegations of overseas Koreans, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					Present there on invitation were diplomats of different countries and representatives of international bodies and members of the military attaches corps here.
					
					President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					The reporter said that the birth of Kim Il Sung was a great fortune that greeted the sun of Juche, the first of its kind in national history spanning five thousand years and a grandiose event which brought about the dawn in the era of independence for the Korean people and the progressive mankind.
					
					In the first period when he embarked on the road of revolution the President clarified the new truth that independence serves as a lifeline of people, country and nation and that the revolution should be made independently and creatively according to one's own faith, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					The President expounded in a unique manner the Juche-based revolutionary outlook on the world, basic principles of revolutionary movement and its methodological issues, properly reflecting the independent desire and desire of the popular masses. This revolutionary idea served as encyclopedic guidelines in the struggle for independence and socialism and a powerful militant banner.
					
					He steadily developed the struggle for the country's reunification and relations with other parties and states on the principle of independence, laying a solid foundation for bringing earlier the independent reunification of the country. This fully displayed the external authority and dignity of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state, making tangible contribution to the cause of independence against imperialism and human cause of independence.
					
					The President defeated the formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialist enemies in one generation to save the destiny of the country and nation and create a history and tradition of great victory in the war. These undying feats will shine forever along with the triumphant advance of Songun revolution.
					
					He is the genius of creation and construction and father of socialist Korea as he built socialist society centered on the popular masses regarding socialism as the basic political idea of the Korean revolution.
					
					The revolutionary cause of Juche, Songun revolutionary cause started by Kim Il Sung and glorified by leader Kim Jong Il is making steady progress on a new high stage thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					We will invariably keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism which the great Generalissimos followed their whole lives  no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and whatever difficulties we may face, thus fulfill our mission and obligation as descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciplines of Kim Jong Il.
					
					We should develop the People's Army into an invincible and matchless army strong in idea, bolster both in quality and quantity the nuclear force, life of the nation and national treasure of reunified Korea that can never be bartered for anything, and wage a stronger all-out action with the U.S. to cope with the prevailing wartime situation, true to the Songun leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					All party members, service personnel and people should burn their hearts with Kim Jong Il's patriotism, do more good things conducive to the building of a thriving nation, greet the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War with high political enthusiasm and brilliant labor feats and thus demonstrate to the world the invincible spirit of Songun Korea by carrying forward the ever-victorious history and tradition.
					
					The DPRK will develop external relations with other countries in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and make active contribution to defending the peace and stability in Asia and the rest of the world and the cause of global independence as a responsible nuclear weapons state. 
					
					Such celebration meetings also took place on Sunday in all provinces, cities (districts), counties and industrial complexes.
					
					Meanwhile, similar meetings took place in provinces, cities (districts) and counties and at complexes.

articles.title: KIZ Crisis Is Attributable to S. Korean Authorities: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
KIZ Crisis Is Attributable to S. Korean Authorities: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- As regards the important steps taken by the DPRK over the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ), the south Korean authorities have recently let loose such sheer sophism that "the north closed KIZ which was in good operation" and "the north should make proper option." The "Saenuri Party" and ultra-right conservative media are also spreading false rumor to give impression that the DPRK is putting pressure on them over the issue of KIZ, with such rhetoric of the "height of pressure on the south" and "strangling under careful scenario."
					Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says the responsibility for the KIZ crisis rests with the south Korean group of traitors as it reduced the zone to the source of war provocation regarding it as the last target of its confrontation moves against fellow countrymen.
					
					The puppet forces who have systematically destroyed the work of KIZ are taking issue with the DPRK, a shameless act reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!", the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					They try to make the public convince that they are interested in the KIZ issue while making groundless remarks. Lurking behind this is their sinister intention. They seek to cover up their crimes of putting the situation of KIZ at the risk of complete closure, evade the public criticism and shift the blame on to the DPRK.
					
					With no sophism and smear campaign can they evade the responsibility for the worst crisis of KIZ.
					
					They had better behave themselves, bearing in mind that their provocative remarks would bring the work of KIZ to a total collapse.

articles.title: U.S. Is Responsible for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Responsible for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. keeps up such rhetoric as "provocation" and "threat" by the DPRK in the international arena to make the public convince that the DPRK is to blame for the escalating tension in the Korean Peninsula. 
					The U.S. is also justifying its war drills as ones for "getting ready to guard against the north" and "defending its ally."
					
					Rodong Sinmun on Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					Such rhetoric is nothing but a petty trick to cover up its ulterior base goal of creating a touch-and-go nuclear war situation on the Korean Peninsula and shift the responsibility on to the DPRK and justify its moves for invading the DPRK.
					
					It is mulling realizing its ambition of holding a dominant position in the Asia-Pacific region at any cost by occupying the DPRK by force of arms which is located in a strategically important point.
					
					It is making last-ditch efforts, afraid that if the DPRK brings about an economy boom backed by nuclear weapons, its policy of hostility toward the DPRK will end in fiasco.
					
					The U.S. tries to evade the responsibility for the situation on the peninsula which is at the point of explosion by its hostile moves to stifle the DPRK. But things will not proceed as it hopes.
					
					The U.S. is resorting to the whole gamut of intrigues. But it is an arch criminal pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase.
					
					The U.S. imperialist warmongers' act of shifting the blame is aimed to brand the DPRK as the "harasser of peace" in the world eyes and create an atmosphere favorable for its moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					But it is a serious blunder.
					
					If the U.S. keeps following its ambition of stifling the DPRK, failing to come back to its senses, the DPRK will mobilize all its war deterrent force to blow up the stronghold of aggression of the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK Will Surely Achieve Final Victory: Media
articles.content:
DPRK Will Surely Achieve Final Victory: Media
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A Syrian paper and a Finnish magazine recently carried articles disclosing the moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK.
					The Syrian paper Saut Al-Shaab said:
					
					The unprecedented large-scale military drills of the U.S. imperialists are extremely straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. has introduced nuclear strategic bombers into the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. is asserting that such maneuver serves as a "diplomatic signal" to relieve its allies, south Korea and Japan of their worries and induce the DPRK to opt for dialogue.
					
					The threat of the imperialists against the DPRK has been continued for a long time.
					
					Military tension on the Korean Peninsula is escalating due to the U.S. undisguised strategy to dominate the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					However, the service personnel and people of the DPRK will surely destroy U.S. imperialism and achieve a final victory.
					
					An internet magazine of Finland carried an article which said:
					
					Humankind should remember the fact that the U.S. turned the DPRK into ashes during the past Korean war and mercilessly massacred the Korean people.
					
					The DPRK is a peace-loving state.
					
					The second war is certain to be ignited by the U.S.
					
					It is just for the DPRK to react to the U.S. nuclear threat with nuclear weapons.
					
					The U.S. has continuously introduced latest nuclear war means into the Korean Peninsula, staging joint military drills with south Korea. 
					
					Such move is pushing the regional situation to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					However, the DPRK is standing up against the nuclear threat by the U.S.

articles.title: Honorary Citizenship Awarded to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Suk, Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Honorary Citizenship Awarded to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Suk, Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and the dear respected Kim Jong Un received the title of honorary citizenship of Delleg, Ecuador.
					A ceremony for conveying the certificates of honorary citizenship was held at the city government office on April 4.
					
					Present there were figures of the city government and masses and a delegation of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries.
					
					The mayor handed them over to the head of the DPRK delegation.
					
					The mayor said:
					
					I am glad to present the title of honorary citizenship to the three commanders of Mt. Paektu who performed undying feats for the Korean revolution and the world revolution and Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, at a time when the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung is being celebrated significantly.
					
					The presentation is an expression of profound reverence of our citizens for the three commanders of Mt. Paektu who devoted their lives to the sovereignty of the country and the freedom and happiness of the people and Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders and glorifying the DPRK as a socialist political and military power.
					
					The heroic struggle of the Korean people, who have built socialism of Juche despite persistent sanctions and pressure of the imperialists, is a valuable example for us in building a new progressive and democratic society.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Hekadaha Printing and Publishing House of Indonesia.
					The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					It expounds the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army has assured the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and that it will provide a sure guarantee for the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					It sets forth the tasks for demonstrating the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carrying out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 9.

articles.title: Songun Policy of DPRK Praised by Indonesian Personage
articles.content:
Songun Policy of DPRK Praised by Indonesian Personage
Pyongyang April 14 (KCNA) -- Thanks to the Songun politics, the DPRK could remarkably boost its national capacity and firmly defend its sovereignty and the security of its people despite the imperialists' decades-long moves to stifle it.
					The director of the Hekadaha Printing and Publishing House of Indonesia said this at a ceremony of publishing the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" on April 9.
					
					The director said he was pleased to publish the work of Marshal Kim Jong Un. He added that the U.S. and its allies dare not provoke a war against the DPRK, which has Kim Jong Un's wise leadership and service personnel and people who are united in single mind.
					
					He wished the service personnel and people of the DPRK success in their efforts to implement the line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on April 7 dedicated its one whole page to an article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and photos of his old home in Mangyongdae and Kimilsungia, the immortal flower.
					
					It said:
					
					Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, is being profoundly revered by progressive mankind as the eternal sun of Juche. He ushered in the new era of the development of international relations based on independence. He set independence as the basic principle in state relations and fixed it as an iron rule to exercise the complete equality and sovereignty in external activities.
					
					He is immortal as the sun of Juche in the hearts of progressives as he devoted his whole life to hewing out the era of independence and triumphantly advancing the cause of global independence.
					
					The Russian paper Priamurskiye Vedomosti on April 3 carried special articles under the banner title "Great master in the 20th century" illustrated with a photo of Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It cited facts to introduce in detail the data on deep reverence of foreign heads of state for Kim Il Sung, who performed great feats in the world history of politics in the 20th century.
					
					The April issue of the German paper Rote Fahne carried a special article titled "Day of Sun, April 15, 2013" accompanied with a portrait of Kim Il Sung and a photo of him standing together with Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Tajikistan, Sweden and Guinea on April 5 and 6 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					Kurbonzyon Mirzoyeva, member of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, praised the President for liberating Korea and leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					The President wisely led the post-war rehabilitation and construction and the building of socialism, she noted.
					
					Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, gave a lecture on the subject "The eternal sun of Juche".
					
					The chief said:
					
					The President ushered in the era of independence by founding the Juche idea.
					
					He pioneered and led the cause of independence to victory with his original revolutionary leadership of Songun.
					
					Always adhering to the line of giving priority to the military affairs, he thoroughly embodied the principle of independence in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					His achievements and experience in the revolution and construction greatly encouraged the progressive people aspiring after independence.
					
					The President will always live in the hearts of the progressive mankind as the sun of Juche as he ushered in the era of independence and devoted his all to the victorious advance of the cause of global independence.
					
					The vice-chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea referred to the fact that patriotic and revolutionary songs were created and disseminated in each period and at each stage of the Korean revolution, dynamically encouraging the service personnel and people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Int'l Community
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Int'l Community
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is enjoying admiration by the international community for his great exploits of markedly changing the fate of Korea and providing a foundation for its lasting prosperity.
					The domestic radio of Guinea said that the President, founder of the socialist Korea, liberated Korea, saved its people from the yoke of colonialism and laid a firm groundwork for the lasting prosperity of the nation.
					
					The chairman of the Moldovan Songun Youth Union for the Study of the Juche Idea said the DPRK secured the guarantee for prosperity under his leadership by constantly adhering to the line of preserving Juche in ideology, independence in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times praised the President as the eternal leader of Korea who provided a solid foundation for the Korean revolution.
					
					The general secretary of the Permanent Committee of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung said thanks to his independent politics and Songun leadership, the DPRK was able to absolutely foil the moves of the imperialists and reactionaries against the DPRK and socialism.
					
					The Lao paper Heng Ngan said it would be unthinkable without him that Korea is fully prepared in terms of ideology, politics, military and technology and has the people's army equipped with strong offensive and defensive means and full-fledged nuclear deterrence.
					
					The Russian paper Rio Panorama said Kim Il Sung declined the request for the admission to the Council for Mutual Economic Assistances after the war and held fast to the line of building an independent national economy to carry out the historic task of industrialization in a brief period of fourteen years.
					
					The general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy said Kim Il Sung devoted his all to carrying out the cause for Korea's reunification till the last moments of his life.
					
					The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo said:
					
					It goes to the credit of peerless patriot President Kim Il Sung that the DPRK is thriving now.
					
					His idea and exploits will go down through generations and the future of the DPRK will be rosier in the 21st century as the country is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea took place in New Delhi on Apr. 6 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					Present there were personages of different social standings and followers of the Juche idea in India, representatives of international and regional organizations. Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to India and staff members of his embassy.
					
					The speakers praised Kim Il Sung for founding the immortal Juche idea and performing great exploits for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence, adding that he thoroughly embodied the idea in revolution and construction to make the Korean people strongest in the sense of independence in the world and turn the DPRK into the people-centered socialist power.
					
					The Juche idea has been studied and disseminated worldwide, they noted, speaking highly of leader Kim Jong Il, who pursued Songun politics, continuation of the Juche idea, and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and a state of manufacturing and launching satellites despite the imperialists' persistent sanctions and economic blockade against it.
					
					The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il have been successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un. Rosy is the future of the DPRK as it is led by Kim Jong Un and the Korean people are sure to achieve national reunification, they said.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Iranian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Iranian Newspaper
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of the historic report of the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the recent plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was carried by the Iranian paper Iran News on April 8.
					The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Praised by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posed articles on its website on April 4 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					An article titled "Undying Songun leadership feats" said Kim Jong Il put the national power of the country on the highest level, turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power united in single mind and ushered in a new era of prosperity for building a thriving nation with his Songun leadership.
					
					His Songun revolutionary leadership is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the article noted.
					
					Another article titled "Meaning of Kim Jong Un's inspection of Panmunjom" conveyed the news of his inspection of Panmunjom in March 2012. It made the following analysis of the meaning of his inspection:
					
					First, it is the demonstration of his resolute resolution and will to fight without slightest compromise or concession against those who try to violate the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK, and win a victory without fail.
					
					Second, it is the demonstration of his steadfast will to reunify the country without fail, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: U.S., Its Followers Accused of Moving against DPRK: Regional Body
articles.content:
U.S., Its Followers Accused of Moving against DPRK: Regional Body
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Oceania regional preparatory committee to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War in a statement on Mar. 28 accused the U.S. and its satellite forces of their war moves against the DPRK.
					Nearly six decades have passed since the conclusion of the Korean Armistice Agreement, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The U.S., however, has failed to implement even elementary provisions of the agreement, keeping deploying on the Korean Peninsula tens of thousands of troops along with nuclear weapons by abusing the name of the UN.
					
					The situation on the Korean Peninsula has been extremely aggravated nowadays.
					
					The U.S. is staging large-scale joint military exercises together with its followers in different parts of the Korean Peninsula in the wake of prodding the UN Security Council into cooking up the "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					Huge nuclear forces including nuclear warships and nuclear strategic bombers have been amassed in the vicinity of the peninsula since the conclusion of the armistice agreement.
					
					The U.S. and its followers deliberately seek to create an atmosphere of military confrontation on the peninsula.
					
					We condemn the U.S. for its moves to push the situation to the brink of a war, while escalating the tension in the Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. and the forces following it should immediately stop their moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S., Its Followers' Anti-DPRK War Moves Slammed in Chile
articles.content:
U.S., Its Followers' Anti-DPRK War Moves Slammed in Chile
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place outside the south Korean embassy in Santiago on April 5 to denounce the U.S. and its followers for their moves for a war against the DPRK.
					Present there were members of the leadership of political parties and organizations and hundreds of people in Chile.
					
					A statement of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) was read out there.
					
					The statement said the south Korean authorities under the domination and subjugation of the U.S. imperialists are serving them to stifle the DPRK and colonize the whole Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. is gravely threatening peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world while staging military exercises with its followers after introducing strategic bombers, nuclear submarines and nuclear carriers into the Korean Peninsula, the statement noted.
					
					The U.S. imperialists prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK to invent a pretext of aggression against it while resorting to the cruel and constant blockade to stifle it, the statement said.
					
					The south Korean authorities are harshly oppressing and exploiting people and brutally cracking down on their struggle for vital rights and national reunification, it noted, adding:
					
					We recognize south Korea as a stooge of Yankees.
					
					We also reaffirm full solidarity to the DPRK in its struggle to defend its dignity, sovereignty and peace.
					
					The first secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) in his speech strongly denounced the U.S. imperialists and their followers and south Korean puppet regime for their moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK and expressed full support and solidarity for the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Moving to Put Korean Peninsula under Its Control through War: Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Moving to Put Korean Peninsula under Its Control through War: Newspaper
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud on April 7 carried an editorial condemning the U.S. war moves against the DPRK under the title "The U.S. should dismantle its nuclear weapons".
					Saying that whenever the imperialists faced trials internally and externally, they massacred people in different countries and enforced economic blockade and sanctions on the DPRK and other progressive countries in a bid to establish an economic and political order favorable for them, the editorial said, adding:
					
					The tension on the Korean Peninsula is mounting due to the campaign against the DPRK.
					
					Japan was defeated by the armed struggle led by President Kim Il Sung, and afterwards the U.S. militarily intervened in Korea.
					
					The U.S. tried to use nuclear weapons as leverage for the settlement of issue in Korea, too, as it did in Japan.
					
					The U.S. was the provocateur of the Korean war.
					
					After occupying south Korea under the pretext of "disarming" the Japanese army, the U.S. supported the south Korean reactionaries loyal to its interests.
					
					Referring to the efforts made by the DPRK in the face of the U.S. Asia-Pacific domination strategy, the editorial went on:
					
					The U.S. needed a war policy to foster conflicts and develop the economy for manufacturing WMDs including nuclear weapons.
					
					The imperialists are trying to bring under their control the Korean Peninsula, land of great geopolitical significance, pursuant to their strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					The UN Security Council should strive to ensure peace today when nuclear powers exist in the world.
